Main Menu
Create Trip Button
Clicking this button will take you to the menu for creating a trip. A trip consist of a set of chosen locations which you want to visit.
Show My Locations Button
Click this button to go to a view presenting a list of all locations created by you.

Map is there for you to choose coordinates for your location - simply click on the map in a desired location, and a small marker will be displayed.

Trip Creator
Introduction
With using trip creator you are able to set and create new trip. In the creator it would be possible to set all important settings including adding locations to visit for each day of the trip.
MainSettings

On this page of the creator you can pick name for the trip and provide custom description. Moreover, here you must set start and end date of the trip. It is important since next page uses the information about number of days. You are also asked to choose TravelMode and DistanceUnit
Show Locations on Map

These views allow you to see location on the map, specifically in your closes area, but you can navigate the map to whichever place you want. Clicking a marker representing location on the map will show a small snippet above the location and also present location\'s name and status under the map.
Locations come in two types: public or private, and depending on which button you choose in Main Menu you\'ll either see all public locations or all private locations.
There are two buttons on the bottom of the view.
After selecting a location on map you can press this button and you\'ll be redirected to view that will present you details about your chosen location.
Clicking this button will redirect you to the Synchronization Panel, where you can download more locations.
Location\'s List
What you will see here is a list of all locations that have been download to your device. You can use the scroll to navigate the list.
If you want to see more information about a particular location, simply click it on the list. You will be redirected to location details view.
Location Details
Here you can see basic information about a chosen location, such as it\'s:
Settings

This view contains a list of all settings and preferences available in the application. Currently there are three: Language, Default User and Clear Databse. Select one of the settings by clicking it on the list
Language

Here you can choose language for Tour Trip application. At the moment you can choose only English and Polish, but more languages are to come! Select your language from the dropdown list and press button "Change language". Keep in mind that all location\'s and trip\'s descriptions will remain in the language they were originally wrtten in.
Default User

You can set your account to be a default account in the application, which will enable you to use "Log as default user" option when logging in. Simply check the checkbox and press "Change". Keep in mind one thing though: there can only be one default user, so any other user can override this setting.
Clear Database
If you ever think that there are many unused locations or trips on you device, here you can clear app\'s database.
By checking the boxes near "Private data" or "Public data" you can choose to delete only public, only private, or both types of locations from your device.

When it comes to trips, you can delete all trips from database, or only ones that are considered as \'past\', \'current\', or \'future\' - select from a dropdown menu the category. This will only remove trips that are connected to your account.
